summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, providing for construction of traffic signal improvements and street lighting at the intersections of Boylston Avenue East at East Lynn Street and Eastlake Avenue East at East Roanoke Street as part of the New Safety Signals (1978) Project, authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts, increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department and making an appropriation therefor.
